1596420.name: ORBTRAIN - Slot Racing Demo
1596420.description:
Compilation of two racing and four sports games with these game modes.

SLOT RACE

  • Experience slot racing like never before and enjoy the constantly changing perspectives on ten racetracks.

PURSUIT RACE

  • Overtake the other cars, detach all elements of the orbtrain and reach the pole position.

GUIDED BALL

  • Position the ball so that you can hit it well with your desired technique. Be surprised at how far you can throw a ball and show off your skills by guiding it into the target with your eyes.

CLIMBING MANIA

  • Climb dizzying heights and collect the orbs after you've cleared the targets. Enjoy the sweeping views of the playing field.

SCRAMBLE ACTION

  • Sharpen your senses, focus on the targets around you and get them.

POWER PUNCH

  • Feel superhuman strength as you smash the massive orbs to pieces with your hands.

Watch the video to get an idea of how to play.

Game instructions are shown at the beginning of each game mode.
1596420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
